answers.answer: Flashing lights means there is residual traction on the retina.  This can last for some time after retinal detachment surgery.  This is not due to your cataract.Dr. O.

question: i  had  retina  detachment  surgery 2 months  ago  and   I  am    still  seeing   flashing  lights.    I  have  a   bad  cataract  in  the  same  eye  but  must  wait   before   have  it  removed  because  I   have  diabetes.   How   long  will  the   flashing  light   remain.;  Is   this  considered  part  of  the    healing  process?    Does  the  cataract  cause  the  flashing  light?
title: Flashing  lights
